Research publications
Learning-based planning of autonomous systems
  • The Search for Feedback in Reinforcement Learning (workshop: Model-Based Reinforcement Learning for High Dimensional Nonlinear Dynamical Systems) R. Wang, A. Sharma, Karthikeya Sharma Parunandi, R. Goyal, Mohamed, Suman Chakravorty Karthikeya S Parunandi , S. Chakravorty, published in American Control Conference, 2025
  • The Search for Feedback in Reinforcement Learning, A. Sharma, R. Goyal, R. Wang, Mohamed, Karthikeya S Parunandi , S. Chakravorty, published in Journal of Dynamic Systems, Measurement and Control, 2025 (Approved for publication)
  • Decoupled Data-based Approach for Learning to Control Nonlinear Dynamical Systems, R. Wang, Karthikeya S Parunandi , D. Yu, D. Kalathil, S. Chakravorty, published in IEEE Transactions on Automatic Control, 2022
  • On the Search for Feedback in Reinforcement Learning, R. Wang, Karthikeya S. Parunandi, A. Sharma, R. Goyal and S. Chakravorty, published in 60th IEEE Conference on Decision and Control (CDC), 2021
  • D2C 2.0: Decoupled Data-Based Approach for Learning to Control Stochastic Nonlinear Systems via Model-Free ILQR, Karthikeya S Parunandi, Aayushman Sharma, Suman Chakravorty, Dileep Kalathil, arXiv pre-print, 2020
Model-based planning of autonomous systems
  • T-PFC: A Trajectory-Optimized Perturbation Feedback Control Approach, K. S. Parunandi and S. Chakravorty, published both in IEEE Robotics and Automation Letters and the proceedings of IEEE/RSJ IROS, 2019, Macau, China
Robust pose-graph SLAM of mobile robots
  • Robust Pose-Graph SLAM Using Absolute Orientation Sensing , S. Agarwal, K. S. Parunandi and S. Chakravorty, published both in IEEE Robotics and Automation Letters and the proceedings of IEEE International Conference on Robotics and Automation (ICRA), 2019, Montreal, Canada
